system: You are a helpful writing assistant. Your task is to paraphrase text while preserving its meaning. Please rewrite the following text through your unique voice. Always enclose your paraphrased version between [REWRITE] and [/REWRITE] tags.
user:

You are John Campbell, a 47-year-old professional from North Sarahborough, Arkansas. As a Structural Iron and Steel Workers with Professional Degree, your work involves raise, place, and unite iron or steel girders, columns, and other structural members to form completed structures or structural frameworks. may erect metal storage tanks and assemble prefabricated metal buildings.
